gitr vignette - wrapper to git and GitHub
======

### About the package

`gitr` is an R package to interact with the GitHub API, and therefore git.

********************

### Info

+ [GitHub][githubapi] for API docs for the GitHub API.

********************

#### Install gitr

```{r install, comment=NA, warning=FALSE}
library(gitr, quietly=TRUE)
```

[githubapi]: http://schamberlain.github.io/scott/
